src.description: Name of the function in NCS that generated the log

dom.description: Enum value representing the processor core or ARM TrustZone execution environment (secure or nonsecure) from which the log message originated.

lvl.description: Enum value for the log level: [1: ERR, 2: WRN, 3: INF, 4: DBG]

msg.description: The message data that was logged

ts.description: Unix timestamp given in milliseconds when the message was logged

seq.description: Sequence number of the message. This is a counter, used for ordering message if `ts` not available/used
